scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.setup: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c auto "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
